results.text: but those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
results.reason: Encouragement to find strength in the Lord through hope.
results.reflection: When we place our hope in the Lord, He renews our strength and enables us to overcome any challenge.

results.text: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
results.reason: Affirmation of finding strength in Christ for all things.
results.reflection: Our strength does not come from ourselves but from Christ who empowers us to accomplish all things.

results.text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
results.reason: Acknowledgment of God as our source of strength and help.
results.reflection: In times of trouble, we can find refuge and strength in God who is always with us.

results.text: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.' Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christâ€™s power may rest on me.

results.reflection: In our weakness, we can rely on God's grace and find strength in Him, knowing that His power is made perfect in our inadequacies.

results.text: Finally, be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power.
results.reason: Encouragement to draw strength from the Lord's power.
results.reflection: Our strength comes from being rooted in the Lord and His mighty power, enabling us to stand firm in faith.
